definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
abbr. of 麵包車的士|面包车的士[mian4 bao1 che1 di1 shi4]/minivan taxi
(coll.) to take a taxi/to go by taxi
seems as if/rather like/Taiwan pr. [si4 de5]
yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
have plenty of/there's no lack of

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 这些中药中就有生长于云南和贵州的茯苓。

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: Look at these coasters over here.
Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 显示所有关于这个主题的文章。

sentences.english: Yeah, like gentle breeze blowing through the cheeks, the hair dancing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 是的，像微风吹过面颊，因为发梢在跳舞。

sentences.english: Further Practice for Pairs ·Add a third speaker and create your own lines.
sentences.chinese: 加进圈外人，创作你们自己的对话。

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不错，足以使我获得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向东开去的火车由于信号错误而均被取消。

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出产性活动己的总称能够举行。

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至可以数出苏联果园里的果树并分析其产量。

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那种早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的软体也可以减少医疗疏失。

sentences.english: For Saliou, the work in the mines goes on.
sentences.chinese: 对Saliou来说，矿山的工作还要继续。

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，该头骨具备类似现代亚洲人头骨的特征。

definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
